contents:
新起點題材：Deadly Chased by the prc

「romantic love is boring ! Everybody can fall in love with each other. That’s not freaking news, ok? How about playing a game called”Deadly Chased by the org ”？The org is most powerful empire of cyber evils，there are millions of tough punches from young men waiting for u ! Wow!Then u will find that traps all over the world, as well as hackers seems to u they r everywhere. .That's not all. After that u sat down facing the final war in New Rome. Alerting!“u most likely to die after being caught! ”could u find your excitement mounting up while u r assuming the game plan ?if u could survive, brag to bro all your life!
